name: Kathmandu Heritage Tour
description: Kathmandu, the capital city of Nepal is an exotic and fascinating showcase of splendid culture, art and tradition. It is made up of three legendary cities named Kathmandu, Bhaktapur and Lalitpur. Bhaktapur has been known as living museum in the world because, home of traditional art and architecture, historical monuments and craft works, magnificent windows, pottery and weaving industries, excellent temples, beautiful ponds, rich local customs, culture, religion, festivals, musical mystic and so on.
